channel.title: Goudont 668 Back up [Eco || PvP (with points) || Webclient || 24/7 || Quests]
channel.description:
LINKS: ~CLIENT~ http://www.mediafire.com/?a79hyiavgof536d
~FORUMS~ ~Coming very soon
~WEBCLIENT~ ~Coming very soon
Welcome to Goudont 668, this server, you will love because it has full economy, player vs player with pk points! Membership rank (sexy benefits + adding more) skilling, completionist cape, all skill capes, quests... tons more! Here are some of our features.
-[color=green]Skilling, full economy + PKing with PK points - REPORT ABUSE SYSTEM (::reportabuse (playername) (Details) CLAN CHAT (100% clan chat, and owner has to create the clan in order for other people to join) - POINT SHOPS (Donator points, vote points, pk points... etc) - QUESTS (3 members, 2 non members) [New added for members] - NEW HOME - PLAYER RANKS (instead of players asking for mod, admin, they can just use these ranks, and show their position in the server. [NOTE: THIS WON'T GIVE THEM STAFF POSITIONS, OR MEMBERSHIP, it just shows their position in the server.] - GOOD, EVIL rank : You have a position in the server that if you do bad(evil) things, like killing npcs, stealing, doing some quests in a bad rank.. etc. And if you do good things, like doing SOME of the GOOD quests, burrying bones, etc. (This feature is still being worked on) - Dungeoneering (10 floors max) : This is a custom make of dungeoneering, with 10 floors, killcounts and stuff, and at the 10th floor, you fight the boss, and when you beat it, you prestige 1+. - NEW pets added
~~PICTURES~~ [IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/6123/loyaltytitles.png[/img] [IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/4135/cooksassistant.png[/img]
LINKS: ~CLIENT~ http://www.mediafire.com/?a79hyiavgof536d
~FORUMS~ ~Coming very soon
~WEBCLIENT~ http://goudontps.comyr.com/
Now, don't come expecting to get staff positions out of no where. You will have to work for them. If you would like to help out the server by donating, please do for a membership rank, unlocking loyalty titles, pets.. MANY more benefits, + it will increase your chances of becoming staff, because you will be helping us, and we shall reward you. When you Buy membership/Donator from us, we give you the best experience, and the money you give us, will be used for website and a VPS system. Staff:
~~ Main (head) Owners~~ ~Goudont ~Jumper ~Kesen
~~ Owner ~~ ~Nick
~~ Co-Owner ~~ ~Nolan

item.description:
@goudont wrote:

LINKS:

~FORUMS~

~WEBCLIENT~
~Coming very soon

Welcome to Goudont 668, this server, you will love because it has full economy,
player vs player with pk points! Membership rank (sexy benefits + adding more)
skilling, completionist cape, all skill capes, quests… tons more!
Here are some of our features.

-[color=green]Skilling, full economy + PKing with PK points

  • REPORT ABUSE SYSTEM (::reportabuse (playername) (Details)
    CLAN CHAT (100% clan chat, and owner has to create the clan in order for other people to join)
  • POINT SHOPS (Donator points, vote points, pk points… etc)
  • QUESTS (3 members, 2 non members) [New added for members]
  • NEW HOME
  • PLAYER RANKS (instead of players asking for mod, admin, they can just use these ranks, and show their position in the server. [NOTE: THIS WON’T GIVE THEM STAFF POSITIONS, OR MEMBERSHIP, it just shows their position in the server.]
  • GOOD, EVIL rank : You have a position in the server that if you do bad(evil) things, like killing npcs, stealing, doing some quests in a bad rank… etc. And if you do good things, like doing SOME of the GOOD quests, burrying bones, etc. (This feature is still being worked on)
  • Dungeoneering (10 floors max) : This is a custom make of dungeoneering, with 10 floors, killcounts and stuff, and at the 10th floor, you fight the boss, and when you beat it, you prestige 1+.
  • NEW pets added

PICTURES

LINKS:
~CLIENT~
http://www.mediafire.com/?a79hyiavgof536d

~FORUMS~
~Coming very soon

~WEBCLIENT~

Free Web Hosting

Free Web Hosting - Your Website need to be migrated

Absolutely Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL, cPanel and no Ads!

Now, don’t come expecting to get staff positions out of no where. You will have to work for them.
If you would like to help out the server by donating, please do for a membership rank, unlocking loyalty titles, pets…
MANY more benefits, + it will increase your chances of becoming staff, because you will be helping us,
and we shall reward you. When you Buy membership/Donator from us, we give you the best experience, and the money
you give us, will be used for website and a VPS system.
Staff:

~Goudont
